deployment_zones.name: Standard Deployment
deployment_zones.description: A balanced deployment that places both warbands on opposite sides of the battlefield.
deployment_zones.setup: Deploy within 12" of your table edge.

deployment_zones.name: Flank Deployment
deployment_zones.description: Forces deploy along the flanks, creating a dynamic battlefield with multiple angles of approach.
deployment_zones.setup: Deploy within 12" of your chosen flank edge.

deployment_zones.name: Corner Deployment
deployment_zones.description: Warbands start in opposite corners, creating a diagonal line of battle.
deployment_zones.setup: Deploy within 12" of your chosen corner.

deployment_zones.name: Edge Deployment
deployment_zones.description: Forces deploy along the long edges of the battlefield, creating a wide front.
deployment_zones.setup: Deploy within 12" of your chosen long edge.

deployment_zones.name: Center Deployment
deployment_zones.description: Warbands deploy in the center of the battlefield, creating an immediate close-quarters engagement.
deployment_zones.setup: Deploy within 6" of the center point.

deployment_zones.name: Diagonal Deployment
deployment_zones.description: Forces deploy along diagonal lines, creating a dynamic battlefield with multiple angles of approach.
deployment_zones.setup: Deploy within 12" of your chosen diagonal line.
